attributes.action: Make it illegal for commercial organizations to withold their telephone number.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The rules and regulations on telephone selling are widely flouted, causing much irritation and wasted time. It is impossible to track down these companies, because their telephone number is withheld. There can be no legitimate reason for a commercial company to do this, therefore it should be made illegal for any company to do so.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to " Make it illegal for commercial organizations to withold their telephone number."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16457

Prime Minister's Office
